definition: to become exhilarated (idiom); in high spirits/full of zest
to become exhilarated (idiom); in high spirits/full of zest
KGB (Soviet secret police)/member of the KGB
full of youthful energy (idiom); vigorous/energetic/a bright spark
to sprout up/to flourish/(of war etc) to break out/rapid growth

sentences.english: There's a businessman named Rob in one of my classes.
sentences.chinese: 有一位叫做羅勃的商人跟我修同一門課。

sentences.english: Robert put the new employees through a series of tests.
sentences.chinese: 羅勃讓新進員工進行了一系列的測驗。

sentences.english: The question is a comparison between himself and Lee Myung-bak.
sentences.chinese: 這個問題是在將他自己與李螟勃進行了狗咬狗地比較。

sentences.english: Leonid Brezhnev and PW Botha are consigned to the dustbin of history.
sentences.chinese: 勃列日涅夫和博塔都被扔進歷史的垃圾堆中。

sentences.english: Ribble said Louie wasn't just failing, he was suffering.
sentences.chinese: 裏勃說，路易不只是成績跟不上，而且深感學習辛苦。

sentences.english: Breughel is one of the greatest painters in Netherlands of the 16th century.
sentences.chinese: 勃魯蓋爾是16世紀尼德蘭地區最偉大的畫家之一。

sentences.english: Mr. Brocklehurst, how passionate and wicked she is?
sentences.chinese: 勃洛克赫斯特先生，她是多麼衝動又邪惡。

sentences.english: The drug company Boehringer Ingelheim developed nevirapine.
sentences.chinese: 勃林格殷格翰公司的藥物開發奈韋拉平。

sentences.english: Brocard angle is an admirable classic in mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 勃羅卡角是數學的一個經典，令人歎爲觀止。

sentences.english: The installation of a STRAUB pipe joints is fast , simple and reliable .
sentences.chinese: 斯特勞勃管接頭的安裝快速，簡單，可靠。

sentences.english: Boehringer Ingelheim is one of the largest pharmaceutical companies in the world.
sentences.chinese: 勃林格殷格翰集團是世界上最大的製藥公司之一。

sentences.english: The hilly southern part is a peninsula called the Pelopnnesus.
sentences.chinese: 多山的南部是一個稱爲勃羅奔尼薩的半島。

sentences.english: I am enormously anxious to finish my night AT the Duke of Bracciano's.
sentences.chinese: 我非常想到勃拉西諾公爵府去過這一夜呢。

sentences.english: Another blare of trumpets signaled that the limousine carrying Brezhnev had entered the Southwest Gate.
sentences.chinese: 在又一陣軍號聲中，勃列日涅夫的小轎車進入西南門。

sentences.english: How did Lady Brandon describe this wonderful young man ?
sentences.chinese: 勃蘭登夫人怎麼描繪這位叫人驚歎不已的年輕人呢？

definition: feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
thick weeds/luxuriant growth/Illicium anisatum, a shrub with poisonous leaves/impertinent
male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
